body: Horniness gone, stayed for plot wtf

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me (i accidentally read this comment, so sorry
A hentai with story. My life is complete
It was stupid af but the yuri ending was satisfying

Waaahhh, it's really great to see a Doujin with a friggin thick plot even tho it's stupid af it got some quality H scenes... Btw I can't seem to find a translated volume 1 of this. Anyone, care about giving me the code for it's 1st part?
I am here, for I have seen it, when it rised
I am here, for I have seen this since it began
I still feel displeased for them not including the last scene of Riley and Shiro.
Some scenes in hentai are amazingly faithful to manga.
"I wish for everyone to be happy." minus all the guys whos heads got eaten by demons who used their bodies to rape and pillage.

Weird that there is a Sawaru hentai universe. That he referenced his earlier works for the creation of Shirley and Riley. Wonder it it was all planed form the start. You'd need Kevin Figie to adapt all that into an animation.

When A hentai has a better plot than a real manga...Lol
I am reading this only for plot now
